title: Why did i get a leaver penalty?
body:
I went to play a blind game, my game crashed during the load screen, it took me roughly 5 minutes to log back in because i had to restart my CPU then when i open league back up, i get prompted with an "I agree" to leaver penalty box... why did it not allow me to just join back into my game after only 5 minutes? I dont understand this...

The game log says Leaver (Remake)... so im deemed a leaver for my cpu crashing? Thats not really fair.

Any other time this has happened, which is very rare, im able to just join back into the game and be a few levels down, but this time around it doesnt even have a game to log back into...

replies.body: It sounds like your game accepted a [/remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) due to the leave.  Leaving games cause others a negative experience regardless of intent, and the window you received is just to introduce you to how the leaver system works, and does this for all players.  More information on this can also be found in our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

It's just a prompt to let you know that leaving a game isn't ok and it is triggered by unintentional as well as intentional disconnections. As long as you don't leave frequently, you're good to go.

If you continue to crash or experience any issues, don't hesitate to let us know.
All of us who offer our support. :)
